alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, northern Marathon, southern Oneida and western Langlade Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tomahawk to 15 miles west of Rib Mountain. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Antigo, Weston, Merrill, Rib Mountain, Tomahawk, Harrison, Parrish, Dutch Corners and Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
